long_description: The sleek and elegant LifeProof Nuud Case for your iPhone 5c shrugs off water, snow, dirt and shock, giving you the freedom to bring your smartphone along wherever your adventures take you. Refined and unobtrusive, this case offers a haven from everyday hazards, slim and light convenience and unhindered access to your phone's functions, ports and controls. Fully waterproof design lets you take your iPhone 5c out into the elements (it's even submergible); waterproof sound enhancement system for speakers preserves sound quality. Nuud naked screen technology preserves perfect touch response and uncompromised photo and video quality. Double-coated, real glass lens for the back camera ensures crystal-clear photos and video. LifeProof Nuud Case features dirt-proof and waterproof seals on the case, ports and buttons. Tough frame with military-spec shock absorption can withstand drops from 4 ft.
short_description: The sleek and elegant LifeProof Nuud Case for your iPhone 5c shrugs off water, snow, dirt and shock, giving you the freedom to bring your smartphone along wherever your adventures take you.
